Reason: The configuration option 'XML_PARSER_VALIDATING' is performance-sensitive. This is because the 'XML_PARSER_VALIDATING' configuration directly affects the validation mode of the XML parser within the 'transcode' method. When set to true, the parser performs validation while parsing XML documents, which can impact performance by adding extra processing time and memory consumption. This validation process can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, making it a performance-sensitive configuration.
